DOC.brief_title: Anticipatory Counseling LNG-IUS Continuation , Utilization Satisfaction : A Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Enhanced anticipatory counsel detail side effect initiate progestin-only injectable contraception improve continue use among women.While continuation rate one year among levonorgestrel intrauterine system ( LNG-IUS ) user considerably high progestin-only injectable user United States ( 80 % versus 56 % ) , enhance anticipatory counseling could impact 20 % LNG IUS user choose discontinue method within one year use . For reason , investigator propose study would develop pilot-test anticipatory counsel intervention detail unscheduled bleeding side effect pelvic pain cramping among new LNG IUS user compare `` control , '' use video technology . The investigator choose video technology counsel intervention ensure participant receive exact information LNG side effect , would possible use face-to-face clinician-participant counseling model . The investigator propose two phase study . In Phase 1 , systematic literature search evaluate effective component video use contraceptive counseling development two separate video script lead : ( 1 ) intervention , detail expect side effect safety LNG IUS , ( 2 ) similar-looking `` control , '' detail recommend screen guideline woman , well information LNG IUS safety . This phase study use focus group prior development video intervention , initially family planning expert content accuracy cultural sensitivity , secondarily new LNG IUS user acceptability . Findings phase use fine-tune script prior development video . In Phase 2 study , investigator pilot trial clinical setting evaluate anticipatory counsel video intervention impact LNG-IUS knowledge , continuation , health care utilization , satisfaction . After receive comprehensive contraceptive counseling clinician , woman choose LNG IUS insert give brochure ask participate online study . After signing-on innovative website , participant randomize either intervention control video complete short questionnaire related demographic , baseline menstruation , satisfaction , LNG IUS knowledge viewing assign video . Women follow six month . They ask complete short online survey three six month regard LNG IUS continuation , health care utilization , satisfaction . Findings study serve design future , appropriately power randomize control trial assess LNG IUS continuation , utilization , satisfaction rate 12 month .
